data.name: HallThruster.jl
data.description: An open-source fluid Hall thruster code

evidence: "HallThruster.jl is an open-source, 1D fluid Hall thruster code written in Julia. It is developed by ... at the University of Michigan" (indicates a university research group developing the code).

"HallThruster.jl has been used by professionals and student teams alike to conduct electric propulsion research. See Science highlights for a list of publications that have used HallThruster.jl." (shows it is used directly for research simulations/results).

"To install HallThruster.jl... enter the Pkg REPL. To install HallThruster.jl type (@v1.12) pkg> add https://github.com/UM-PEPL/HallThruster.jl" (installation via Julia's package manager using a Git URL, i.e., package-registry-style workflow).
